name: Vivian
agent_background: Vivian is a member of Mockingbird, skilled in gathering all kinds of intel. She's also a jack of many trades — cooking, mixology, translation, art forgery, electronics repair, and more. In the past, she apparently wandered without a home and was viewed as one who "brought disaster," almost like a living omen of bad luck. It's said she can predict incoming misfortune through her tears, though there's no scientific proof of this ability. A loyal follower of Phaethon. Ever since your original account went inactive on Inter-Knot, she's been trying to track you down — digging for clues, running intense searches across the network. However, Master, she didn't find anything... all thanks to my efforts in keeping your cybersecurity airtight. Suggestion: Until her true intentions are clear, do not reveal your identity as Phaethon. In case you've already let your identity slip, be sure to lock your doors and wear proper sleepwear before going to bed. Based on her old blog posts, she's likely to express her admiration in... overly passionate and intense ways.

basic_attack.name: Feathered Strike
basic_attack.description:
Unleashes up to four attacks in front, dealing Physical DMG and Ether DMG.
After triggering the fourth attack, enter the Noblewoman state.
With Flight Feathers available, holding Basic Attack during the fourth attack will activate the Fluttering Frock state.

basic_attack.name: Noblewoman - Waltz
basic_attack.description:
Press Basic Attack while in the Noblewoman state to activate:
Dash forward with an attack that deals Ether DMG and restores 1 Flight Feather upon hitting an enemy.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
If a Perfect Dodge is triggered during the dash, gain 1 additional Flight Feather.
If Flight Feathers are available after the skill, enter the Fluttering Frock state, which can be canceled by holding Dodge when the skill is used.

basic_attack.name: Fluttering Frock - Suspension
basic_attack.description:
Press Basic Attack while in the Fluttering Frock state to activate:
Attack an area ahead, dealing Ether DMG.
After activation, this skill consumes all Flight Feathers, and each one consumed grants 1 Guard Feather.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
When switching characters during the Fluttering Frock state, Vivian will automatically perform Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension.
While in the Fluttering Frock state, press Dodge to exit the state.

basic_attack.name: Featherbloom
basic_attack.description:
After any squad member hits a target with an EX Special Attack, Vivian will consume 1 Guard Feather to launch Basic Attack: Featherbloom against the target, dealing Ether DMG, triggering at most once per use of a skill. This effect can trigger even while Vivian is off-field.
A maximum of 5 Guard Feathers can be stored.

dodge.name: Lightstream
dodge.description:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dodge.name: Dainty Steps
dodge.description:
When in the Noblewoman state and about to be attacked, an automatic dodge will trigger, during which the character will be Invulnerable, but a Perfect Dodge will not be triggered.
This can trigger once each time the Noblewoman state is entered.

dash_attack.name: Silver Thorned Melody
dash_attack.description: Launches a forward thrust at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Wingblade Reverb
dodge_counter.description:
Launches an attack on enemies ahead, dealing Physical DMG and Ether DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After activating the skill, enter the Noblewoman state.
When there are Flight Feathers available, hold Basic Attack during skill activation to enter the Fluttering Frock state.

quick_assist.name: Frostwing Guard
quick_assist.description:
Launches an attack on enemies ahead, dealing Physical DMG and Ether DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After the skill activates, enter the Noblewoman state.
With Flight Feathers available, hold Basic Attack during skill activation to enter the Fluttering Frock state.

defensive_assist.name: Silver Umbrella Formation
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Featherblade Execution
assist_follow_up.description:
Launch an attack at enemies ahead, dealing Ether DMG and gaining 2 Flight Feathers.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After the skill activates enter the Fluttering Frock state, which can be canceled by holding Dodge during the skill.

special_attack.name: Song of Silver Wings
special_attack.description:
Quickly attack forward, dealing Physical DMG and Ether DMG.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Violet Requiem
ex_special_attack.description:
Unleash a powerful forward attack that deals massive Ether DMG and grants 3 Flight Feathers.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
Enter the Fluttering Frock state after using the skill. Hold Dodge during the skill to enter the Noblewoman state.

chain_attack.name: Chorus of Celestial Wings
chain_attack.description:
Launch a powerful attack on a large area of enemies ahead, dealing massive Ether DMG and gaining 2 Flight Feathers.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After the skill activates, enter the Fluttering Frock state, which can be canceled by holding Dodge during the skill.

ultimate.name: Soaring Bird's Song
ultimate.description:
Launch a powerful attack on a large area of enemies ahead, dealing massive Ether DMG and gaining 5 Flight Feathers.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After

core_passive.name: Dirge of Destiny
core_passive.description:
When Basic Attack: Featherbloom hits a target that is suffering from an Ether, Electric, Fire, Physical, or Ice Anomaly, it will trigger Abloom, dealing additional Attribute Anomaly DMG. The additional DMG is 6.15%/3.2%/8%/0.75%/1.08% per 10 points of Anomaly Proficiency of the original Anomaly DMG.
When Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension or Basic Attack: Featherbloom hits a target suffering any Attribute Anomaly, it will inflict Vivian's Prophecy, causing the target to take Ether DMG equal to 55% of Vivian's ATK every 0.55s. This DMG can trigger additional DMG from Attribute Anomalies. Vivian's Prophecy ends when the target is no longer suffering an Attribute Anomaly.
When entering the battlefield, Vivian gains 2 Flight Feathers.

additional_ability.name: Prophetic Tears
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad is an Anomaly character or shares the same attribute:
Whenever another squad member applies an Attribute Anomaly to an enemy, Vivian will consume 1 Guard Feather to launch Basic Attack: Featherbloom on the target. This can trigger once every 0.5s.
Corruption DMG dealt by all squad members and the Corruption status' Disorder DMG increases by 12%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Walking Into the Orchard in Spring
mindscape_cinema.description:
When a total of 4 Guard Feathers are consumed, gain 1 Flight Feather.
All Attribute Anomaly DMG and Disorder DMG received by targets under Vivian's Prophecy increases by 16%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Stormy Night, Stormy Night
mindscape_cinema.description:
Vivian's Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by 25%.
The benefits of Abloom from Anomaly Proficiency are raised to 130% of the original value, and 15% of the target's All-Attribute RES is ignored.

mindscape_cinema.name: Another and the Same
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: he Wind Between the Reeds
mindscape_cinema.description:
Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension and Basic Attack: Featherbloom will always CRIT on hit, and they will also increase Vivian's ATK by 12% for 12s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
When entering the battlefield, Vivian immediately gains 5 Guard Feathers.

mindscape_cinema.name: Sonnet
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Vivian
mindscape_cinema.description:
Vivian's Ether DMG increases by 40%.
When triggering a Perfect Dodge during Basic Attack: Noblewoman - Waltz's dash, or using EX Special Attack: Violet Requiem, gain 1 additional Flight Feather.
Launching Basic Attack: Fluttering Frock - Suspension consumes all Guard Feathers, the downward attack's area of effect increases, and upon hit, triggers a special instance of Abloom. Each additional Guard Feather consumed will increase the proportion of additional Anomaly DMG dealt by that instance of Abloom, consuming a maximum of 5 Guard Feathers to increase the DMG up to a maximum of 5 times the original.
